markdown:
**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 308 1.1 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- This bizarre staff is made from oak, capped with a cluster of eye-shaped gemstones that seem to move and undulate at the corner of your vision. While wielding the staff, you can peer through the eyes on the staff rather than your own, using your normal visual senses (including any benefits of spells like [_see the unseen_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1663)). You can maneuver the staff to see things around corners, at higher elevations, or in places where the staff can fit but your head can't. This doesn't provide sufficient line of effect to target creatures around corners. The eyes are as vulnerable as your eyes and can be affected by anything that alters your vision, such as a blinding flash of light. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Effect** You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells. Staff of Impossible Visions **Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 308 1.1, [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 263 2.0 **Price** 230 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_daze_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1482)
  • **1st** [_fear_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1524), [_phantom pain_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1632)
  • **2nd** [_augury_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1445), [_paranoia_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1623)
Staff of Impossible Visions (Greater) **Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 308 1.1, [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 263 2.0 **Price** 1,800 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **3rd** [_hypnotize_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1564), [_paralyze_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1622)
  • **4th** [_countless eyes_](/Spells.aspx?ID=680), [_vision of death_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1742)
  • **5th** [_strange geometry_](/Spells.aspx?ID=719)
Staff of Impossible Visions (Major) **Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 308 1.1, [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 263 2.0 **Price** 10,000 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **6th** [_blinding fury_](/Spells.aspx?ID=672), [_phantasmal calamity_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1630)
  • **7th** [_visions of danger_](/Spells.aspx?ID=358), [_warp mind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1754)
Staff of Impossible Visions (True) **Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 308 1.1, [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 263 2.0 **Price** 70,000 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **8th** [_spirit song_](/Spells.aspx?ID=303), [_uncontrollable dance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1730)
  • **9th** [_unfathomable song_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1731), [_phantasmagoria_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1629)
name: Staff of Impossible Visions (Greater)
